title: Some type of error RE: Skin instead of champion
body:
Today i recieved my mystery gift, of which I anticipated either Ekko or Bard as these are the only champions that I do not have unlocked.

I log into my account and I get the information prompt, "You have all the champions, here is a mystery skin instead - Sakura Karma"

I can assure you I would much rather one of the champs >_> Has anyone else experienced this? Or was there fine print that alluded to this happening?

Regards.

replies.body: Riot said themselves you will be gifted a Mystery Skin instead if there are 10 or less champions you don't own left. It's not an error.

I have still not received my skin but my friend had the same issue he was hoping for one of the five champions he didn't own but instead got Dragon Slayer Pantheon. 

Could be an error but think of it this way you get a free skin.
